title: Le Chemin... J'ai rendez-vous avec moi
description:
Ces méditations se proposent à toi comme des amies chaleureuses qui souhaitent t'aider sur ton cheminement de vie.
Je les partage ici comme une synthèse d'un long processus personnel de 40 ans, au cours duquel la méditation a eu toujours sa place privilégiée. Au fil des années, elle changeait ses formes, styles et origines, mais restait toujours un moment précieux et indispensable pour revenir vers moi-même et vers l'essentiel. 
Etant engagée sur ce chemin spirituel authentique et profond, je m'inspire de différentes approches thérapeutiques, artistiques et énergétiques qui viennent compléter une vision et un amour pour l'être humain dans sa globalité.
Ainsi s'explique mon style très personnel et la variété des propositions.

Je propose ici toujours quelques méditations par cycle pour donner un aperçu et une première expérience. Si tu es intéressé d'avoir accès aux suites (il y a entre 7 et 30 séances par cycle), contacte moi par mail (juliahuppert1@gmail.com) et je te demanderai une donation d'un montant libre en échange.

Merci pour ton intérêt !

title: Raw Vegan Lens
description: Join me for an authentic raw vegan journey. I will never sugar coat my experience, lol. If you're searching for a pristine, flawless, skyrocket to raw perfection, keep searching. This is not it. My raw journey resembles a big pile of knotted zoodles. I bought my first raw book, Juliano's RAW in 2000. In 2006, I finally realized that raw a was an actual lifestyle, not just a handful of freakishly disciplined people, and I started 'going raw.' I've gone raw and fallen down literally hundreds of times. But I'm always learning and honing my skills. I will not stop. I can't. There's nothing like raw. I believe it's the absolute best version of myself, hands down, the person I was meant to be. How can you discover your full potential, if you're not using the best fuel and becoming your best self? Raw veganism is an incredibly healing path. It's also the way I choose to manage my ADHD and the most effective way I've discovered since being diagnosed at age 6. In 2005 at hypnotherapy school, I experienced a powerful dream, did dream a therapy session on myself and developed an obsession with self healing. Off the top of my head, I've healed uterine fibroids, squamous skin cancers, UTIs, sinus infections, plantar fasciitis, bronchitis and most recently an undetermined autoimmune illness. Join me for an honest look at a raw path and growth.

title: "Love Your Skin" with Dr. Pallavi
description:
Welcome to Holistic Skin Wellness! I'm Dr. Pallavi, your guide to unlocking the secrets of radiant and healthy skin using the power of holistic approaches.

Imagine a world where skincare isn't just about surface-level treatments and products but a journey that nourishes your entire being – body, mind, and spirit. Well, that's exactly what we're here to explore!

As a passionate advocate for holistic skin wellness, I've seen firsthand the incredible results that can be achieved when we embrace a holistic approach to skincare. Forget about quick fixes and temporary solutions; we're diving deep into the transformative power of natural and alternative therapies.

In this podcast, we'll embark on a thrilling adventure through a diverse range of topics. From the foods you eat to the lifestyle choices you make, we'll uncover the secrets of nourishing your skin from within. But we won't stop there – we'll also dive into the realm of mindfulness and stress management, because let's face it, our skin reflects our inner state too!

And guess what? We're not stopping at conventional methods. We'll explore the captivating worlds of homeopathy and naturopathy. These holistic practices have been trusted for ages, and together, we'll unlock their potential to address various skin concerns and rejuvenate your skin naturally.

But here's the best part: we're not just here to educate you; we're here to empower you. Expect engaging conversations with top experts in the field, insightful interviews, and practical tips that you can immediately incorporate into your skincare routine.

Are you ready to embark on a transformative journey to radiant and healthy skin? Then join me, Dr. Pallavi, on Holistic Skin Wellness. Together, we'll uncover the joy of embracing a holistic approach to skincare and unleash your skin's true potential.

Tune in to Holistic Skin Wellness with Dr. Pallavi, and get ready to experience skincare like never before!

title: THE GREAT BREAK: the podcast you don't want to hear!
description:
Our world is undergoing a massive awakening and its during this time many people are confused, scared and unsure about the stability we can offer future generations. As a collective we have been given a great opportunity in the midst of destruction. It is in this chaos of change and destruction is where we can wake up to our fullest potential! 

Those who are having a "GREAT BREAK" are seeking new ways of living and being but don't know where to start. If you have a deep desire  to enhance your self autonomy and  to finally have a say in co-creating what most people desire; peace on earth, love, a healthy lifestyle and freedom to move, live and express oneself without judgments, this podcast will touch on many topics that will be your guiding light in such dark times.

The Great Break touches on various topics that surpasses mainstream societal perceptions and belief systems by seeking the interconnective links and synchronicities  in all things verses indifferences and separation consciousness. This includes marrying mysticism, science, religions, ancient medicines, sexuality, tribal rituals, psychology, health and fitness and much more.

It's time to enhance and expand our collective consciousness by breaking free from mind influencing conditionings of who we once believed to be and to begin finding the commonalities in one another to empower each of us of who we are truly meant to be... All powerful, empathic loving, expressive and creative human beings.

title: מה קורה בטיפול שלי?
description:
״מה קורה בטיפול שלי״ הינו פודקאסט וקבוצת פייסבוק, העוסקים באתיקה טיפולית בצורה ישירה, ברורה ולא מתפשרת. הקבוצה והפודקאסט נולדו בעקבות פרסום תחקירים על פגיעות במרחב הטיפולי,ונבעו מתוך צורך בוער למנוע פגיעה, לעשות סדר ולהסיר את המסתורין מעולם הטיפול- עבור מטפלים ומטפלות או מטופלות ומטופלים. 

מדי שבוע אני אשוחח עם דמות מעולם הטיפול שיש לה תפיסה ייחודית על המתרחש בתוך חדר הטיפולים, זווית שעשויה להאיר אור ולהעניק צורה חדשה של התבוננות על כל הדבר המוזר הזה שנקרא - טיפול נפשי, פיזי או רוחני.

title: Healing From The Holy Land
description:
In this podcast series I explore various aspects of holistic healing, as an Intuitive Healer experiencing the world and the healing energies around us.
We will touch on, and go in-depth about, many topics - including Meridians, Chakras, Yin Yang energy, self-healing techniques, Flower Essences, Meditations, Guided Imagery, Color Healing, and the effect of the cosmos on individuals and the world via zodiac signs and other cosmic events (moon phases, eclipses, meteor showers and the like). Content is intuitively guided and so what comes up is what I will be talking about!
Often, if not always, content reflects what is going on in my own personal healing journey, or what I see coming up for those around me, or both.
Here's a bit about me and my background:
I was born in America and lived there for just over two decades before I moved to Israel with my family over 20 years ago. 
I am a Holistic Healer with over ten years of experience practicing CranioBalance Therapy, have a thriving range of Flower Essences (Beit Roga Gardens*) made from flowers, trees, and elements in my home community in Israel, as well as from the Dead Sea, and run a private practice called Beit Roga* (House of Tranquility). I have learned many other holistic healing techniques along the way, and all my healing is done on an intuitive level. (*Check out more at beitroga.com and beitroga.com/shop)
I started out as a Physical Therapist and quickly learned that I was healing via intuitive feedback. I also recognized that simply dealing with the physical aspect of a client's pain or dysfunction was not dealing with the whole picture. 
Over the years I have trusted my inner knowing and followed my intuitive guidance to learning more and more about holistic healing, and most importantly, to trusting the information that comes to me intuitively. It all links back together and each time I learn another aspect of healing I am amazed anew at all the inter-connections. It all comes from one Source, and that is made clear over and over again. 
We are living in exciting, magical times when more and more healing is coming up to the surface. Old healing practices coming back to modern day use, intuitive guidance on the rise in peoples' awareness, holistic healing becoming more and more popular with the general population, and a greater forum expanding globally for all this information to come to light.
If you have found me, then there is magic here for you to explore. I look forward to reading your comments about how this information resonates for you. 
Devorah Harow
Alchemist and Intuitive Healer
Israel
Healing from the Holy Land

title: 37Health
description:
٣٧ مئوية ، برنامج يدور في مدار الطب وسيرة الطب، لياليه وأيامه، متاعبه وأحلامه، يحلق حوله لكنه لا يقتصر عليه، ينطلق من مواضيع الطب والصحة إلى ما هو أبعد، الى التجربة الانسانية بعنوانها الأصفى والأرحب. 

ابق على تواصل مع ٣٧ مئوية ولا تنس تفعيل زرّ الاشتراك الموجود في تطبيقك لتصلك الحلقات أولاً بأول.

 

                                                                  


                                                              




 

الحلقة الأولى تقودنا الى شخصية الطبيب والروائي خالد حسيني مبعوث النوايا الحسنة للمفوضية السامية بالأمم المتحدة لشئون اللاجئين.

 

كان من بين ٤٠ مليون نازح، ممن عثر بهم الحظ والجغرافيا والتاريخ، تضيق بهم الأرض، تحشرهم في الممر الأخير.

عندما حطت به الطائرة لاجئا في الولايات المتحدة قبل ٤٠ عاما، لم يكن يعرف الانجليزية. بعدها بسنوات يجد الجالسة الى جواره على الطائرة تقرأ احدى رواياته. يشاهد التلفزيون يوما فيسمع اسمه كجواب صحيح يدلي به متسابق في برنامج مسابقات شهير.

 

هو اليوم روائي شهير طبعت من رواياته أكثر من ٤٠ مليون نسخة.

في هذه الحلقة تتعرفون على خبايا القصة الحقيقية لفتى الشرق النازح.

 

الحلقة الأولى من تقديم: د. أميرة السنوسي و د. رياض سلمان

إعلان الحلقة: الأستاذ والإعلامي القدير عصام سيف

الدبلجة بصوت: الأستاذ محمد الموالي

فكرة وبحث: د. يثرب العالي

مراجعة وكتابة النص: أسرة التحرير

تصميم الشعار: أبرار الحجيري  و حبيب الفردان

التأليف الموسيقي: أحمد الغانم

الإشراف والمتابعة: د. رياض سلمان




المصادر:

 

١- مقال صحيفة التايم في ١٧ مايو ٢٠٠٧ بعنوان " كاتب عداء الطائرة الورقية يعود لوطنه"

 

٢- موقع وكالة اللاجئين بالأمم المتحدة

 

٣- مقال من صحيفة التيليغراف ١٩ مايو ٢٠٠٧ بعنوان " اليأس في كابول"

 

٤- مقال من موقع الإذاعة الأوروبية ٢١ يونيو ٢٠١٢ ، بعنوان : كاتب عداء الطائرة الورقية : عن طفولته ، كتاباته، وقضيته -اللاجئين الأفغان

title: Lyt til din cyklus
description:
Lyt til din Cyklus måske prøver den at sige noget vigtigt 

For nogle år siden blev jeg nysgerrig på den kvindelige cyklus hvordan den fungere jeg var træt af at have følelsen af at være i krig med min hormon balance som igen igen trak mig rundt i manegen
I min undersøgelse af hvem der vidste noget om emnet fandt jeg Doro Knudsen faldt med det samme for hendes måde at formidle og forsimple hvordan du kan bruge din cyklus lærer den at kende slutte fred med den måske ligefrem lærer et elske den 

Hun indvilgede i at dele sin store viden ved at svarer på mine mange spørgsmål gennem en personlig samtale os imellem. Jeg havde lyst til at vi skulle optage samtalen så andre også kunne drage nytte af hendes store viden og smukke tilgang til cyklus bevidsthed det er blevet til 4 afsnit som afdækker den mest basale viden om kvindens cyklus hvis du ønsker at dyrke den og værne om det cykliske liv både som mand eller kvinde er denne podcast serie

title: The Natural Health Revolution
description:
It's time to join The Natural Health Revolution!
 
Dr. Sarah Kelly (PhD) brings you the latest from the fields of health, nutrition, science and wellbeing to help you take care of your long-term health. Each week, Sarah unpacks a topic that affects our everyday health with the latest facts & research from well-respected experts in their field (academia, science, medicine, health).

It can be hard to sift through all the information we are bombarded with when it comes to health - especially when we don't know who to trust. We bring you experienced voices to cut through that noise of misinformation and give you the foundational knowledge you need to make up your own mind. Our goal is to breakdown complicated subjects into the philosophy of 'gentle changes': small steps we can take to create healthy and sustainable habits in the long-term!

A former Assoc. Professor at the School of Health & Human Performance at Dublin City University, Sarah brings her passion & expertise to each conversation -  creating casual and easy-to-follow conversations with experts covering Gut Health; Pelvic Health; Menopause; Skincare; Chronic Disease; Heart Health and much more.

No More 'Taboo' Subjects!
The Natural Health Revolution wants to empower people to understand how to take care of their own bodies without embarrassment. Sarah and her guests lead by example with honest conversations about subjects we need to get comfortable with if we want to take care of ourselves and each other.

title: The New Human Podcast
description:
Hosts Sarrah and Jasmine create a conversational journey as they take on unchartered territories of what is to become a 'New Human' through all topics Mind-Body-Spirit. 

The hosts' life-long, personal, metaphysical and extra-sensory events alongside decades of spiritual practice provide  a  springboard for all-encompassing and unlikely discussions based around the purpose and machinations of existence, through the merging of Science and Spirit as we transform into our personal and collective human evolution through Ascension. 

Sarrah and Jasmine take turns each week opening the discussion for anything and everything related to becoming a New Human.

Beyond Darwin’s evolve or die hypothesis of survival of the fittest, humanity has done a fantastic job of survival, but with little regard to the expense of the planet, our health, each other, and our soul’s intended journey of spiritual awakening into love and unity consciousness. 

The next evolution of human development can not mimic the past, nor do most of us want it to. As the rest of the world weighs out the long-planned Great Reset, the New Human challenges that the greatest transformation of humanity will take place on the inside first. We explore the paradigms of spiritual practice, dogma, societal mass consciousness and its ongoing programming, and propose new ways to discover our own deepest truths. We learn how to discover a deeper resonance beyond our five senses.

From Med-Beds to Frequency Medicine, Extra-Terrestrial civilizations to using the human body as a frequency antennae, spirituality, oneness, ancient wisdom leading to full-energetic awakening, the sky’s the limit as we conceptualize together, the latest discoveries and ideas that will transform the progress of the human race in the way it was always intended - a more natural and connected soul-driven evolution. 

We’ve all heard about the New Earth. Let’s take the journey together to uncover this new human that will thrive as it brings forth its Golden Age, ensuring that the next human evolution is for the betterment of all.

~ Hosts, Jasmine Sterling and Sarrah Powell
~ Original Music by permission of artist Ray McGeehan   https://amzn.to/3M3MPKg

www.sarrahpowell.com
www.bighappyplanet.com

title: Whatcom Birth Stories
description:
Birth stories are important. They hold significant meaning to us, as the person giving birth, and to our community.

Telling a story can be healing, and therapeutic. It takes us back to the moment that was joyous, or traumatic. It moves through us.

Hearing a birth story from our own communities is so important. We learn what the birth culture has in store for us, we learn what options we have in our area, and we can connect and build community much more deeply.

This podcast is a place to hear the stories of people giving birth within Whatcom County, WA. A place where we can tell our stories and be heard and seen. A place where maybe our story will reach the person it needs to, to help them make a decision in their pregnancy, birth or postpartum.

Whatcom Birth Stories will also hear from local birth professionals who can be a tremendous support during our childbearing years.

Enjoy these stories from our community. [:

title: Eat Meditate Live
description:
Welcome to my Podcast! 
This is a major project for me but I got started. My life has been thrown so a few lemons lately and frustration about some of these things led me to discover other things I want to do about life outside of my work as a nurse. Podcasts! 
Podcasting came up while meditating. In fact, during a few meditations but I could never seem to remember them when I came out of that transcendental state. Until one night. It came back to me while showering. So here I am!
I will be talking about different topics in this podcast-- from my work as a nurse, meditating, food, day to day experiences, travels, life journey, and all sorts of things that make this world go round... with a touch of lessons that come with them. Also, GUESTS to share their expertise on different topics.
And if you fancy something for me to discuss here or for comments and suggestions, feel free to email me at 
blueheartblueheartblueheart@gmail.com.

Thanks and continue to Eat Meditate (maybe) Live!

title: A Positive Impact!
description:
Learn everyday tricks and tips used by successful WLS veterans. Join Speaker, Author Colleen Cook, WLS patient from 1995, as she shares experiences, insights and research on what it takes to reach and maintain long term weight loss.
 
An enduring inspiration for decades, Colleen Cook has educated and motivated audiences all over the world.  She is a successful weight loss surgery patient from 1995 and President of Bariatric Support Centers International.  Named “Bariatric Professional of the Year” in 2009, and honored by the International Federation of the Surgery for Obesity for her research. Colleen is the author of the internationally acclaimed, bariatric best seller, The Success Habits of Weight Loss Surgery Patients book and is a sought after speaker for both professional healthcare conferences and weight loss celebrations.

As an obesity education advocate, Colleen’s research-based presentations are a valuable addition to any healthcare conference for nurses, dieticians, or mental health professionals. A former member of The National Speakers Association since 1996, Colleen is a seasoned speaker and her presentations are well crafted and can be customized for a particular conference theme.
https://www.amazon.com/Success-Habits-Weight-Loss-Surgery-Patients/dp/0974017973/ref=sr_1_1?m=A3B8EHSFMPG8PM&s=merchant-items&ie=UTF8&qid=1540998543&sr=1-1&fbclid=IwAR3D0N0-RNjUMDeWfRJP8uFHNh1_Y_zfa4AO9_zXKROrFquWWDFZ16heUZE

title: ولادة ناعمة
description:
أنا روان كمال أبوتايه- عواد، أم لطفلين وطن وصوفيا. مبادرة ورائدة أعمال ومدربة متخصصة في مجال الولادة بالتنويم الإيحائي، باحثة في عالم الوعي والطاقة والتشافي الذاتي.
تدربت على تقنية التنويم الايحائي خلال حملي وولدت طفلتي في الماء بولادة سهلة،رائعة وايجابية. 
بعد ولادتي قررت تعلم هذا الموضوع وتدريبه لأكبر عدد من النساء في العالم العربي، ومن هنا بدأت فكرة ولادة ناعمة.
 من خلال هذا البودكاست سأشارك معكم قصص ولادة ناعمة من حول العالم العربي، سنتكلم عن الولادة و كل ما حولها من جانب نفسي وروحاني ونتعرف على أفضل التقنيات لولادة سهلة و إيجابية.  
 
سنمر معًا في 7 خطوات للتحول والتمكين من خلال الشاكرات السبع الخاصة بك. سنتوقف في كل مرة في إحدى الشاكرات، نتعرف عليها، ونعترف بها، ونتعلم كيفية علاجها حتى تتمكني من الحصول على تجربة أفضل أثناء مخاضك.
أدعوك لأخذ هذه المعلومات بعقول وقلوب منفتحة وممارسة جميع ممارسات التكامل التي سيتم طرحها في البودكاست.

title: EFT Tapping por Sophie Da Costa
description:
EFT tapping es la técnica de sanación y crecimiento personal más utilizada en EEUU. También conocida como la "acupuntura emocional sin agujas", se utiliza para mejorar cualquier asunto emocional (ansiedad, estrés, insomnio, depresión, adicciones, bloqueos...) o físico (sobrepeso, dolores, inflamación, migrañas, fibromialgia...). 

Sólo se necesitan unos minutos al día y los resultados son permanentes. Está recomendado por los mayores expertos en crecimiento personal del mundo: Tony Robbins, Louise Hay, Wayne Dyer, Deepak Chopra...

Puedes descubrir más sobre EFT Tapping en mi web www.sefeliz.net. 

Si quieres aprender a manejar esta técnica en profundidad para aplicarla en lo que necesites, echa un vistazo a mis cursos online de EFT Tapping en www.cursostapping.com.

Y si te gustaría trabajar conmigo en sesiones para un acompañamiento más personalizado, escríbeme a informacioneft@gmail.com😊

title: Passing Through A Vegan Door
description:
Hi! My name’s Harry, and welcome to Passing Through A Vegan Door Podcast. 

Veganism is a growing idea that leaving animals alone can save the world. It can be quite scary to take those first steps and change life long habits, but it’s important to find a way to break those habits and understand that what we do to animals every day isn’t right. 

Passing Through A Vegan Door is a way for me to talk about the things I care about while offering an insight into the who's, the what's, the when's, the where's, the why's, and the how's of being vegan. This podcast is for everyone: whether you’ve got decades more experience than me in being vegan; or you just wish vegans would shut up and let you eat your steak in peace. I’m not the expert… I’m just here to pass on the word. Hopefully it can be somewhat entertaining as I do. 

I will cover a range of topics such as: the environment, society, health, politics, diet, the animals themselves, and more! I will be chatting to people who share a similar mindset, and a common goal of living a vegan lifestyle, but also people who couldn’t care less. Those are the people who have the power to make real change. Small changes do make a big difference, and I hope to show you how.

“To be vegan, is to release your grip on the animal”

Thank you for reading, I hope whatever I can offer can be of help. Follow my instagram page @passingthroughavegandoor to keep up to date 🌱

title: Rebel Heart Coaching Podcast
description:
The Rebel Heart Coaching Podcast is hosted by Samantha Shatek, a Board Certified Life & Nurse Coach, Integrative Health Practitioner, & BSN Registered Nurse. 

This space is for the holistic-minded woman (& brave, emotionally mature man) who is ready to stop hiding and playing small. You're ready for an upgrade. You want to step more fully into your potential & to your calling. I help you reconnect with possibility, lost dreams, & your authentic self. Live a bigger & more full life on your own terms. 

I show you how you can feel more safe & grounded in your body and better regulate your emotions & nervous system. 

I encourage you to start truly honoring yourself, find your inner and outer voice, create better boundaries, stop people-pleasing and perfectionistic tendencies, and step boldly into a more confident version of yourself.

 Upgrade your health, business, & relationships by getting into the driver seat of your own life.

This is your go-to podcast for discovery. I invite practitioners, makers, healers, artists, musicians, & scientists on the show to share with you their wisdom and medicine. We'll explore a variety of topics that include the intersection of science & spirit, neurology & psychology, medicine & nature, and art & music.

A variety of topics will include; making more money, starting a business you’ve always dreamed of, changing careers, sacred geometry, meditation, breathwork for healing trauma, anxiety & depression-where it comes from and how to change it, creating more value in your business, getting a promotion, losing physical/mental/emotional weight, improving your confidence, leaving or manifesting a new relationship, improving the relationship with yourself and with others, seeking permission, healing from chronic illness, manifestation, & money stories. It’s all served with a side of humor and sass. Plus, you'll learn simple tools for transformation, healing & dealing w/trauma, and creating any change you want in your life. 

You’ll learn to recognize the old patterns/habits that don’t serve you, heal from your past, and create a new story that helps you step more powerfully into a more aligned version of the future you envision.

My hope is that you get a lot of value from this show so you can create lasting change in your life right now. I hope that you will be curious about the possibilities for your own life you maybe haven’t even considered yet, be inspired by other people’s stories, and learn crucial information that you can apply to your life.

title: Hormone Healing | Migraines, Birth Control, Mood Swings, Fertility, Periods, Libido
description:
Do you wish you could finally have a regular period? Are you scared to tell your doctor about your mood swings, hormonal acne, and heavy periods for fear that you’ll be told to try another kind of birth control? What about the constant headaches and mood swings that you deal with every day?

Well, girl, I am so excited you’re here!

In this podcast, you will learn how to regulate your period naturally, decrease mood swings (yes, even postpartum!), eliminate headaches, and enjoy sex again!

I’m Dominique, a mom, military wife, daughter of Jesus, and women’s hormone specialist! I remember a time when I suffered with the worst period cramps and migraines. Then, after my first daughter, I suffered from postpartum depression. However, I did not want the new form of birth control that everyone told me to try. I wanted to get to the root cause of my problems and not just slap a “band-aid” on them. So I went back to school (yes with a new baby and a toddler) for my Master of Science in Nutrition Sciences with my focus in women’s hormones.

I learned how to heal my hormones and created a plan that was easy, natural, and doable because that’s what I needed as a busy mom of littles. And now I’m ready to share everything I’ve learned with you.

If you are ready to finally get to the root cause of your period problems, mood swings, and lack of sex drive, then grab your notebook and pen (or crayon if that’s all you can find), your beverage of choice, and get ready to listen in!

Website: Hormonehealing.org

Email: hormonehealing1@gmail.com

Hasta que un día un amigo me recomendó frenar y empezar a escucharme a través de la meditación ; me lo tomé en serio porque mi salud empezaba a estar muy afectada. 
Comencé con la meditación y no tarde en ver resultados en mi manera de ver la vida y de disfrutar de ella.

title: Unpacking Neuroqueerness
description:
Hello, my name is George Muniz Gund (he/they). I am a young Brazilian American autistic and ADHD actor, neurodiversity acceptance and disability justice advocate. In this podcast I talk about my lived experience of being an autistic+ADHD person growing up in a world built for neurotypicals. I also host guests to talk about their own personal lived experiences with neurodiversity, as every neurodistinct person is different and experiences neurodiversity in their own unique ways. My goal is to provide relatable content for other neurodistinct folks and also to educate neurotypicals about Autism, ADHD and other neurotypes, while also trying to show how neurodistinct people can thrive if provided the right environment and properly accommodated, rather than treated as broken puzzle pieces that need to be fixed. *I am not a professional and do not represent the viewpoint of all neurodistinct people, I am just one neurodistinct person speaking about Autism and ADHD from my personal lived experiences, as well as the personal lived experiences of my guests.

*Check out the portuguese version of this podcast, "Explicando Neurodiversidade", and my second podcast "Talking Weather" (both are available on Spotify and Apple Podcasts)

Feel free to contact me at ginhobeleza@gmail.com with any comments or inquiries related to this podcast :)

title: Playing with Perception
description:
Ranga sees meditation as playing with perception. We can learn how to adjust perception, and therefore experience, towards more enjoyment, strength and freedom. Meditation can open doorways to immense joy and pleasure. You can learn how to shift into a higher happiness and dwell in it.

Ranga began his training with formal meditation practice at age 10, and has been on a journey of discovery ever since. After years of climbing the corporate ladder and later co-founding startups, he has shifted his career towards sharing his enthusiastic approach to meditation practice. Ranga's teaching style entails bringing the ancient wisdom of the Buddha to the modern ear, through personal stories and contemporary similes.

Rather than offering a singular, rigid view, he believes that we each hold the authority to find our authentic path in life and to deeply free ourselves up from worrying, anger, doubt, dullness and a sense of lacking. As such, he approaches his role as a teacher with an open heart; open to all the particularities, experiences and uniqueness of each student. He draws on over 20 years of meditation practice and a lifetime of learning from Buddhist (and a few Daoist) meditation masters to guide students on their personal journeys towards what they yearn for.

This podcast follows the journey of two friends, both one in a million, learning to heal, breathe and seek daily gratitude. Join us around the kitchen table as we discuss all things life. A gentle reminder: We are not medical professionals, this is a reflective journey of our lives with SPS whilst remaining under the care of medical teams whose advice we seek and follow. They are spiritual and address your internal being; once you receive emotional healing, insight and awareness inside, more healing comes to your physical body. As you read and listen, I ask God by His Spirit to enlighten your eyes and heart for wisdom, understanding and power to be well and healthy!

title: PharmBUDs
description:
PharmBUDs, created by PharmD students Sierra and Liz, is an interview-led podcast hoping to spark curiosity in prospective and current pharmacy students through candid conversations. Guests from diverse areas of pharmacy expertise share their narratives to inspire a passion for pharmacy aimed at advancing the future of the profession.

Sierra and Liz are “buds” or friends so it seemed important to emphasize that their relationship first budded in pharmacy school. BUDs; however, stands for beyond-use dates. The beyond-use date of a prescription represents the last day the product can be used safely by the patient. Similar to expiration dates, these BUDs are assigned to pharmaceutical products that are manufactured on a smaller scale.

title: Journey to Wellness & Beyond
description:
Not being sick does not equate to wellness! People generally ignore symptoms & illness unless it starts bothering them & that's when they typically visit the doctor. And there is no denying that doctors save lives in emergency situations & arrest or slow down debilitating symptoms & illness with drugs. However it all comes at a cost which leads to more dis-ease, imbalances & ill-nesses. Is that truly health?

We are made to believe that health declines as we age, and that suffering from diseases are inevitable. And that healing is not possible as science continues its search for the fountain of youth & longevity.

But what if the answers already exist? What if there is a way to achieve true wellness without symptoms, illness & suffering?

Join us as we embark on this journey to wellness & unravel the hidden mystery of how to unlock our innate, in-built capabilities. Spanning from how to activate self-healing to awakening our true potential & decoding many such interesting mysteries....

title: Essentials To Heal Yourself
description:
The purpose of this podcast is to offer you new ways of thinking about yourself and your body. To teach you the Natural Laws of Health and the tools needed for you to heal yourself, and what it means to live in harmony with Natural Law.

To expose and dissolve the deep seated social conditioning and beliefs that keep you feeling stuck and fearful, sick and diseased, and giving away your freedom and power - in other words, being enslaved.

So that together we can rebuild our New World founded on the core ethic of Do No Harm. A society that fosters maximum health and well-being, creativity, intuition, growth and the development of consciousness.

title: The Art Of Tranquility
description:
The Art of Tranquility is your best online source for acoustic environments to help with sleep, focus, study, and concentration.

Noise can interrupt sleep, and interrupted sleep is less restorative. Undesirable noise, like air and vehicle traffic that doesn’t disturb sleep can still affect sleep by changing the time we spend in different sleep stages, increasing lighter sleep stages and decreasing more restorative slow wave and REM sleep. Noises during sleep may increase secretion of hormones such as adrenaline and cortisol and elevate heart rate and blood pressure.

Short-term, fatigue, irritability, and poorer mental health are associated with exposure to nighttime noise. Long-term, poor quality sleep due to noise can have a number of adverse effects – heart disease and stroke, high blood pressure, weight gain, increased use of sleep medications , decreased overall health, and certain types of cancer.

A very popular solution is to mask unwanted noise with a more desirable acoustic environment. Many find that masking background noise helps to distract from anxious or intrusive thoughts and readies the mind for sleep. The sounds found to be universally most effective are:

* Classic White Noise

* Ocean Waves & Beach Sounds

* Raindrops & Flowing Water

* Woods & Wilderness

* Relaxing Music

* Pink Noise

* Soothing Voices

title: ASMR
description:
Bambi After Hours: Your Oasis of Serenity

Hey there, I'm Bambi, and welcome to my tranquil corner of the internet - Bambi After Hours. 🌙

About Me I'm a passionate content creator, and my mission is to whisk you away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and into a world of relaxation and serenity. With a background in psychology and a profound love for ASMR (Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response), I've made it my mission to provide you with the ultimate sensory experience.

What I Do Through my YouTube channel, TikTok, Instagram, and Twitch, I craft a variety of ASMR content that's designed to soothe your mind, ease your stress, and give you the best sleep of your life. From whispering softly into the microphone to creating visually captivating scenes, my content is carefully curated to trigger those delightful tingles and leave you feeling utterly relaxed.

Why ASMR? ASMR has the incredible power to transport us to a place of calm and tranquility. Whether you're seeking relief from a long day, struggling with insomnia, or just need a moment to unwind, my ASMR creations are here to help you find that inner peace.

What You'll Find Here On my YouTube channel, you'll discover a treasure trove of ASMR videos, including roleplays, tapping, scratching, and more. Each video is a journey, carefully designed to lull you into a state of blissful relaxation.

My TikTok and Instagram pages offer bite-sized ASMR experiences, perfect for quick moments of calm during your busy day. Whether it's the gentle rustling of leaves or the soft patter of rain, these micro-moments will transport you to a world of serenity.

And over on Twitch, you can join me for live ASMR sessions, where we can interact in real-time. It's a chance for you to make requests, ask questions, and connect with me and the ASMR community on a deeper level.

Community and Connection Bambi After Hours isn't just about ASMR; it's about building a community of like-minded individuals who understand the value of relaxation and self-care. Whether it's sharing your favorite triggers, discussing the latest ASMR trends, or simply finding comfort in knowing you're not alone in your quest for tranquility, you'll find it all here.

Join the Journey I invite you to join me on this journey to a calmer, more peaceful existence. Follow, subscribe, and become a part of the Bambi After Hours family. Together, we can discover the magic of ASMR and the restorative power of relaxation.

So, what are you waiting for? Let's embark on this journey together and create moments of bliss, one whisper at a time. 🌌💤

#BambiAfterHours #ASMR #Relaxation #Serenity #Community #SelfCare

title: Mothermouth
description:
Hi, I am Stephanie Wehowski, artist, herbalist, mother of a 7 year old and dreamer of possibilities.

Mothermouth offers a space to explore major life transitions & journeys to body connection, purpose & joy.

Journey with us as we explore and celebrate life's seasons and rites of passages, often overlooked, invisible, or unmarked in our modern societies.

At Mothermouth, we believe that reconnecting with life’s rhythms is key to reclaiming our connection to our bodies. Cultivating a sense of belonging is crucial, as it provides a safe space for navigating our inevitable growth, allowing us to return to our place in the world with a deep sense of purpose - a birthright we all deserve.

Mothermouth is dedicated to embarking on diverse and transformative journeys towards body connection, power, and pleasure. Our podcast series begins by delving into the realms of birth and its physiology - the profound act of bringing a child into the world. Giving birth signifies the embodiment of our existence, and becoming a mother marks a significant shift in our lives, both from a bodily and societal perspective. While the physical changes are noticeable and acknowledged, we also explore the subtle yet deeply transformative psychological changes of becoming a mother and the challenges we face.

But this is just the beginning. As we set sail from this starting point, our journey will traverse a multitude of subjects, guided by guest speakers and the ever-changing winds of our listeners. As the helmswoman of this ship, I am simultaneously navigating my own voyage towards the imminent rite of passage that is menopause, while still grieving the recent loss of my own mother.

I am passionate about all of us reclaiming sovereignty and standing in our power if that is in our health, purpose, or body connection. And experiencing the joy of sharing and witnessing this in community.

If you are enjoying the series, please support me in making these podcasts and hosting the website through buying me a coffee: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/mothermouth,

And visit my website: https://mothermouth.co.uk

Thank you so much for being here and on this journey together!

Music by 12Volt, with great thanks to my friend Sascha Usison.

title: Surviving HG: The Truth About Plant Medicine
description:
Join Canadian Podcast Host and HG Content Creator, Tori Moline (@goldenteachertori), as she takes a deep dive into an untalked about maternal health crisis Hyperemesis Gravidarum (HG). HG is a genetic pregnancy illness characterized by cyclical vomiting, malnutrition, weight loss and dehydration. It's an uphill battle and can often take years to heal from. Many medical professionals do not know about HG. Many mom's are treated poorly in doctor/hospital care while barely surviving and growing a baby. The current solutions being offered to HG mom's are not working and having short/long term consequences. Some brave women have found a glimmer of hope in a highly stigmatized (sometimes illegal!) anti-nauseant plant during this time; cannabis.

For centuries, HG pregnancies have often gone undiagnosed, misdiagnosed, and/or in some cases, congratulated because of maternal weight loss. History tells us that pregnant women have been silenced for a very long time. History tells us that pregnant women have not been given the space, community, or resources that allow them to thrive. History tells us that HG mom's have been the biggest victim's of this.

HG mom's have not received proper care for generations. HG mom's who have faced HG pregnancies have rarely been given education, resources, or appropriate care.

Cannabis laws vary state to state and country to country. The barrier to many HG mom's is access. It is inhumane that HG mom's are drug tested at birth and persecuted according to their state laws/hospital policies for trying to survive HG.

16 raw stories capturing HG and it's multi-layered wrath... 16 women's stories illustrating a maternal health crisis... 16 HG mom's who bravely chose cannabis.

Se ha formado en numerosos seminarios con expertos internacionales, como Bert Hellinger, Stephan Hausner y Joan Garriga (constelaciones familiares), Federico Trosero (tango-terapia), Bressell Van Der Kolk (tratamiento del trauma), Deb Dana (teoría polivagal) y Daan Kampenhout y Maria Van Der Wijst (chamanismo sistémico).

title: Modern Mom's Wellness Podcast
description:
Welcome to Modern Mom's Wellness Podcast with Jenna Johnston CNS, MSCN and Renata Filiaci MSHW, CD (DONA). We are here to discuss with you all things motherhood, whether it be fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, or the journey through the process with an abundance of resources, emotional support, guidance, and experts. We are starting this podcast to share simple and practical ways that moms can support their physical and mental health during pregnancy and the years postpartum through the use of nutrition, supplements, herbal medicine, and lifestyle factors like sleep, stress management, movement, etc. so they can feel fully nourished during this transformative time in their lives. By incorporating conventional medicine with alternative medicine, we want to show they can both coexist together, and it doesn't have to be black or white.

We are catering to the moms who are looking for something that's quick and easy to understand and also offers them practical ways to include these suggestions into their lives (i.e., tips and tricks). One of our goals is to empower mothers to take care of their health because that means they can better care for their families and, in the long run, it will improve their children's health too.

Disclaimer: This podcast and social media presence represents the opinions of Jenna Johnston and Renata Filiaci and their guests on the show and social media platforms. This content should not be taken as medical advice as we do not treat, prescribe, diagnose, or cure through our practices. The content here is for informational purposes only, and because each person is so unique, please consult your healthcare professional for any medical questions.

title: The Sober Rebel
description:
Some people think that being sober is boring, they may even think that if you have to go alcohol free you've somehow drawn the short straw in life.

But what if it isn't anything like that? What if it's the best thing you could ever do to level up your relationships, your mental and physical health or even your life?

In this podcast Louisa talks to her fabulous sober guests about the joys of the sober life, the fun things they’ve noticed and the amazing things they’ve tried or done since ditching the booze that they’d never have done as a drinker.

These aren’t stories about how people got sober… they’re stories about why they enjoy staying sober.

____________________________

Follow Louisa on instagram @stepping_into_sobriety or head to Amazon to buy her latest book 'Becoming a Sober Rebel' also available on Audible.

Louisa is a Cognitive Behavioural Hypnotherapist helping people with habit change. Check out her hypnotherapy website for more information about therapy or to purchase self hypnosis downloads to try.

title: Mastering Herbalism With Bob Linde of the Traditions School of Herbal Studies
description:
Mastering Herbalism was created to raise the bar for everyone, novice to practitioner, who has an interest and excitement for herbalism. The podcast will bring in leading experts and practitioners of herbalism as well as have Bob Linde, RH, AP talk about some of the aspects of herbalism he is passionate about. This podcast will bring together the importance of tradition, energetics, science and over 20 years of full time clinical experience in acute and chronic disease using Western, Chinese and Bioregional herbs from the tropics. Join us to explore the exciting world of herbal medicine. Special thanks to Jun & Tyler from www.altkemist.com in making this podcast possible. Their professionalism, recording equipment, editing and all the other fun stuff pushed me to join this century.

Bob Linde took a circuitous route to becoming a Registered Herbalist and Acupuncture Physician. Bob started self-study at the age of 10 and didn't know you could be an herbalist as a profession.

His career changed many times. Bob has been a commercial lobster and conch diver, treasure hunter, sail and canoe instructor, wilderness youth counselor, long-line fisherman, infantryman in Desert Storm, and GreenPeace worker. Now, he is focused as the owner of Acupuncture & Herbal Therapies and the Traditions School of Herbal Studies, in St. Petersburg Florida,

Bob designed the two-year Chinese and Western Clinical Herbalist Training Programs and supervises a weekly student clinic for both herbalists and acupuncturists in training.

Bob also consults as a product developer for herbal product companies for humans and animals, and enjoys growing many medicinal herbs in his yard.

Bob has presented at the FSOMA, Florida Herbal, FL Earth Skills, Good Medicine Confluence, and the American Herbalist Guild conferences.

Bob lectures regularly at colleges and organizations around the US. In addition he is a member of many organizations related to herbalism, alternative medicine, and nature conservation.

Bob has also been an avid traveler and travel writer. He has lived in Europe and traveled to the Amazon, Galapagos, Yukon Territory, Caribbean, and throughout the US.

Recently, Bob has completed 12 episodes for INTI TV, “Sanaciones con Bob Linde”, an exploration of indigenous people’s herbal practices. Also, he has appeared on Animal Planet and a number of other tv shows.

Traditions School of Herbal Studies is based in Tampa Bay, Florida founded by Bob Linde, AP, RH(AHG) over 20 years ago started with classes focused on local medicinal plants and clinical Chinese herbal medicine and expanded 8 years ago to include Clinical Western herbalism. Today we offer a wide variety of classes on all aspects of herbalism from a variety of traditions. You can learn more about all the classes and services that we offer at our main location 2520 Central Ave, Saint Petersburg, FL where we have a medicinal plant nursery, clinical practice and our ongoing intern clinic for herbs and acupuncture. You can join us for our many classes at our classroom space and teaching garden at 6340 Central Ave in Saint Petersburg. You can email questions to TraditionsHerbSchool@gmail.com or www.traditionsherbschool.com or clinic at www.acuherbals.com

title: Healthy Business Matters
description:
In this thought-provoking podcast, Dr. White, the founder and CEO of Align & Co., and Nate Baar, the founder and CEO of Health Bar, come together to challenge the conventional norms of health care delivery. Their mission is to inspire others to think differently about health and revolutionize the way it is provided in our country, making it more accessible and affordable for everyone.

Dr. White and Nate Baar kick off the discussion by emphasizing the need to view health care through a broader lens. Traditionally, we've perceived health care solely within the confines of established norms. However, they invite listeners to explore alternative forms of health care delivery and consider different perspectives on medical philosophy.

The conversation delves into the innovative solutions and ideas their respective businesses, Align & Co. and Health Bar, are bringing to the market. Both organizations are focused on reshaping the future of health care by incorporating new technologies, prioritizing preventive care, and adopting a patient-centric approach. Their ultimate goal is to empower individuals to take control of their health and well-being.

By sharing their experiences and knowledge, Dr. White and Nate Baar hope to ignite a paradigm shift in health care delivery. They invite their audience to join them on this transformative journey and envision a future where health care is not only about treating illnesses but also about fostering wellness and improving lives.

It's time to reimagine health care and make a positive impact on the lives of countless individuals.

title: RegenCircle
description:
In recent years the concept of regeneration has re-emerged as a focal point in our collective consciousness and modern narrative. There is a great opportunity and inherent danger in the increasing popularity of regeneration:

Will we, as a species, embrace a co-creative relationship with the natural world? Or merely adopt the language of regeneration to sustain extractive practices with optimistic rhetoric?

RegenCircle is dedicated to exploring questions like these and uncovering the roots of regeneration, beginning with our food system.

title: Sol Revolution
description:
Imagine you just stepped into the best buffet of your life, where you could bee-line right to the station of not only what you were craving, but exactly what you needed to get filled up and leave totally nourished and satiated…

…now imagine that in a podcast form.

This is SOL REVOLUTION PODCAST!

As you walk through the doors, each season in the podcast serves as a “station” at the buffet of your life’s seasons, where you’ll be served with all the encouragement, resources, community and hope you need to nourish your soul, help you heal and move forward in the season of life you need it the most!

Sounds delish, right?!

Each season we'll have a focused topic with a myriad of guest speakers, teachers, stories and experts who we will embark on a curious exploration of different experiences that have shaped our lives.

Each episode boldly delves into inspiring stories and insightful conversations to ignite your inner spark and unlock the full potential that resides within you, while sharing the tools and resources that helped us honor and integrate all of the past, present and future iterations of us along the way.

From uncovering your true passions to the path of self-love, from conquering fears to embracing change, from marriage and divorce to the messy middle, no topic is off limits if we believe it will add to your SOL REVOLUTION.

Vivaciously hosted by Monique Lumè, you’ll get to have the healthiest buffet binge of your life in the form of personal growth, evolution and transformation!

We invite you to pull up a seat at our table and join us as we combine wisdom, laughter, tears and real-life experiences to empower you on your unique journey.

Get ready to embrace a life filled with more purpose, authenticity, and joy as we journey together on becoming 1% HAPPIER, and you begin embodying what it feels like to be a truly HAPPY hYOUman!
